name: Rocketeer (GoatPants)
description:
IMPORTANT: This is a PC and Mac port for a mobile game. You can download the original mobile version here.

Rocketeer is a arcade-style mobile game about flying through space in a rocket ship. Orbit and slingshot from planet to planet to adventure as far from home as possible. As the total distance you've travelled increases, you unlock more rockets. Unlock them all!
